remarks: Lemma for ~ unbnn .  The value of the function ` F ` is less than its value at a successor.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-2003.)
statement:
unblem.2 $e |- F = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> |^| ( A \ suc x ) ) , |^| A ) |` _om ) $.
unblem3 $p |- ( ( A C_ _om /\ A. w e. _om E. v e. A w e. v ) -> ( z e. _om -> ( F ` z ) e. ( F ` suc z ) ) ) $.
$d A v w x z $.
$d F v w z $.
